macro.name: HE3POT_HIGHT_PORT
macro.description: Serial COM port of the ITC used to control the Helium-3 Pot at high temperatures.

macro.name: HE3POT_HIGHT_BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: HE3POT_HIGHT_BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: HE3POT_HIGHT_PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: HE3POT_HIGHT_STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: HE3POT_HIGHT_EMULATOR_PORT
macro.description: Port to connect to emulator for the Helium-3 Pot at high temperatures.
